gloomy.translation[0].definitions[0].def: making you feel that things will not improve
gloomy.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The report paints a gloomy picture of the economy.
gloomy.translation[0].definitions[1].def: sad because you think the situation will not improve
gloomy.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Anne dismissed these gloomy thoughts from her mind.
gloomy.translation[0].definitions[2].def: dark, especially in a way that makes you feel sad
gloomy.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: It was a gloomy room with one small window.
